Package user

Class CompanyRep

java.lang.Object
user.User
user.CompanyRep
public class CompanyRep extends User
Represents a company representative who can post internships on behalf of their company. New representatives require approval by Career Centre Staff before they may access the system.

  • Constructor Details

    • CompanyRep

      public CompanyRep(String userId, String name, String password, String companyName, String department, String position, boolean approved)
      Construct a CompanyRep instance.
      Parameters:
      userId - login id (email) used as identifier
      name - the representative's name
      password - hashed or plain depending on caller expectations
      companyName - company this representative belongs to
      department - dept string
      position - role/position title
      approved - initial approval state

      public void setApproved(boolean approved)
      Mark this representative as approved or not. Approval is typically set by Career Centre Staff.
      Parameters:
      approved - true to approve, false to revoke approval
